name: 萌娘战记
description:
The calm Apaya forest has changed, and the young ladies are scattered around the forest and can't return home, praying for the help of the beast god, so the beast god sends you through the control block to help the young girls get out of the labyrinth of the forest and return home.
Classic Tetris play is combined with puzzle elements.
The game is a type of puzzle. In the process of challenging the level, there will be various random monsters. The tide also rises with the checkpoint time and other obstacles. Players need to use Tetris to get to the gate.
In the level design, the first stage is expected to design 36 different levels, the level selection branch, according to the player's choice in the previous level, the next level of different branch play.
developers: 厦门玩美网络有限公司
